H0.text: Which car company has owned the Lagonda name since 1947. Jaguar

H1.text: Which car company has owned the Lagonda name since 1947. Rolls-Royce

H2.text: Which car company has owned the Lagonda name since 1947. Bentley

H3.text: Which car company has owned the Lagonda name since 1947. Astonmartin

A4.text: Lagonda is a British luxury car brand established in 1906, which has been owned by Aston Martin since 1947.

A5.text: The company was bought by Alan P. Good, who just outbid Rolls-Royce.
